summary: Completed comprehensive testing of enhanced Foratask application. Backend APIs working with 100% success rate after fixes. Frontend has critical JavaScript runtime errors on Attendance page but core functionality (login, tasks, employees) works well. Found major attendance data handling bug.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 400 for missing required fields - expected behavior for validation
minor_issues.fix_priority: LOW - This is correct validation behavior

minor_issues.issue: Returns 400 'Already checked in today' when trying multiple check-ins
minor_issues.fix_priority: LOW - This is correct business logic

ui_bugs.issue: Critical JavaScript runtime error: 'attendanceRecords.find is not a function'

integration_issues.issue: Frontend expects array but receives different data structure from API

navigation_issues.issue: Navigation links become unresponsive after JS errors occur
navigation_issues.fix_priority: HIGH - Prevents accessing other pages after attendance errors

passed_tests: Login with all three seed accounts (admin, supervisor, employee)
Dashboard loads with welcome message and attendance card
Task navigation and listing works
Add Task page with multi-location functionality
Location add/remove controls work correctly
Employee page loads with stats and employee list
Employee search and filtering works
Task creation form with all fields
Remote task checkbox functionality
Due date and priority selection
Doer and viewer assignment dropdowns
Multi-location task controls (Add/Remove locations)
Backend API authentication for all user roles
Backend employee management (admin-only access control)
Backend attendance endpoints (today, history, monthly stats)
Backend chat room endpoints
Backend statistics endpoints with proper parameters
Backend organization settings access
Proper 403 access control for non-admin users
Task API endpoints with correct parameters and validation
action_items: Fix critical JavaScript error in Attendance.js: attendanceRecords.find is not a function
Debug attendance API response format - ensure it returns array format expected by frontend
Fix navigation responsiveness after JS errors occur
Test and fix Chat, Salary, Settings page navigation after attendance fix

success_percentage.frontend: 70% - Core features work but critical attendance bug blocks some functionality
